import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Product } from '../product'; import { PRODUCTS } from '../mock-products'; @Component({ selector: 'app-products', templateUrl: './products.component.html', styleUrls: ['./products.component.css'] }) export class ProductsComponent { products = PRODUCTS selectedProduct?: Product onSelect(product:Product): void { this.selectedProduct = product } }
